attributes.action: Pay the same price for fuel as the Americans i.e. 52p per litre
attributes.additional_details: The Americans pay very little for their fuel as their government does not add as many taxes as our government. Let's petition our government so that we always pay the same as the American's. We are being taxed far too much on our fuel. We pay the same tax on fuel as a billionaire does. This is not a fair tax.
